subject: i ordered on december 19th, where is my order? Order number SSN5062
description_text:
if the order doesnt get here by next week, i would like a full refund of my
order, im done waiting.

conversations.body_text: Hi Wald Al Wahsh,     We apologize for the delay in processing your request. We will arrange for a replacement order to be shipped to you as soon as possible.
